column4: If I call /opt/Wakfu/Wakfu when I'm in / it fails. If I call it in the /opt/Wakfu directory it works. Any way to set up the path for a specific command so I can call from '/' but have it read from /opt/Wakfu as local?
Dope: is adding cd /opt/Wakfu to the top the only way? Is there something I could add to the command line?
